title: On the Super Field Realization of Super Casimir Wa(n)-Algebras
abstract: We give an explicit quantum super field construction of the N=2 super Casimir WA(n)-algebras, which is obtained from supersymmetric Miura transformation for the Lie superalgebra A(n,n-1). And also we give an extension of this algebra including a super vertex operator which depends on simple root system of A(n,n-1).
